TopicTitle: 0.25 Stock heavy fighter bomber (Equipped with stock missiles and cluster bombs)

Articles.Content:
Titan Hunter heavy bomber mk1

Description:

This plane is quite easy to fly with SAS only being required at certain times, built for one purpose and that is blowing things up because why not?

Carries 10 stock missiles on top of its main pay load of 3 decently sized cluster bombs.

Flight instructions :

When releasing cluster bombs turn SAS on, pretty much a given and if it is not obvious you have to switch to the cluster bombs and "detonate" them after releasing them from the plane. otherwise you should be fine to figure this plane out on your own.

Note it is not tested on FAR or NEAR.

Action groups:

1 Toggle engines.

2 Toggle bay doors.

3 Release front cluster bomb.

4 Release right cluster bomb.

5 Release left cluster bomb.

First 5 stages of space bar are missiles.

Download link: part count: 347

http://www./download/8oupo06hypp0b4z/Titan+Hunter+heavy+bomber+mk1.craft

Edited October 21, 2014 by Roflcopterkklol
It would be so simple to use this in Dark Multiplayer and bomb absolutely everything... huehue...

What the hell, I literally just joined the forum when this was up. Can you not reply to posts that are on the last page of the spacecraft exchange?

Other than that, this plane was so manoeuvrable in its time that I think it was a mistake to call it a fighter-bomber.

Edited October 25, 2017 by Matuchkin
